S.FORM: kakiliman Senhuan Senhuan "nusipanya a kamu: San Juan[sa xwan]" namaka amilika nu udipay apala u putulike a kitidaan nu kanatal atu satabakiay a tukay, kamu nu amilika sa 2000 a mihcaan taayaw misausi tu tademaw , ina tukay nu tademaw sa 433,733 nu amilika anukuwanan saka sipyu a tabakiay a tukay. nilaculan ( :San Juan[sa xwan]) 2000 433,733 42 . Senhuan nayi 1521 amihcaan nu sipanya nunisawacuan a binacadan ku patidengay, itawya pangangan han tu "putulike" "Ciudad de Puerto Rico". 1521 (Ciudad de Puerto Rico). Ina tukay nu u cuatademaw ku sayaway itini ayda nu amilika a lala' patideng sat u tukay, mahinisa dadikudan nu setimike "aydaay a tu mi ni ciya" nadikudan nu may cu sakatinusa a nipatideng tu tukay. . ayda, u senhuan nu putulike u tatelungan nu minatu u misangaay tu cacanan , sapakalisiway, lalangawan atu aaidangan.sehuan atukay nu tademaw makaalatu 200 a emang nu tademaw, malatinusa nu subal nu putulike a tademaw. , , . 200 . naemekan [ ] 1508 a mihcaan, huan.pangsay.telayang "(Juan Ponce de León" patideng tuni Kapali" Caparra) nu lingatu a mueneng tini. 1508 (Juan Ponce de León) (Caparra) . Nu sipan ya nu kasaylayse a pangangan, ina kitidaan itawya nu sipanya viyalepihay nu sisikiningay ci nikulase.te.awwantu a nilecuhan. . ayda, widasa Guaynabo nu Pueblo Viejo a kitidaan nu cacay, itini aydaay a senhuan a tukay nu tipan. Guaynabo Pueblo Viejo . dikuda nu tinacay a mihcaan, tini maneknekay a limaden katukuh I tawyaay a putulike a kitidaan, sipanya a kamu sa "nu kakitaan a minatu" ati "kapahay a minatu", win isa uduma a misitekeday atu ci ya na li a maluyaluyay a subal nu ta ciya na li a subal putulike misanengiay. . 1521 q mihcaan, baaluhay muenengay patucek han tu tu ngangan ":Puerto Rico de San Juan Bautista". 1521 :Puerto Rico de San Juan Bautista. Inatukay maadih ku 1595 a mihcaan nu hu lang si se.te lay ke a kakitaan " nu malepacaway nu putulike" atu 1598 a mihcaan pulanpuciyaciyawce.kelihute mukelid tu ingku a tademaw mikidem musasaaku tu kitidaan. 1595 1598 . namakayniay isenhyan a kitidaan nu aylmulu nu bakudang patadikud tu telayke, namahida sa kelihute madateng tu hitay amuliwliw a mibakuhac tina tukayan. . Itini i ingku namaala tu nuheni sa pina abulad, kelihute a hitaymalungatu mangeluen caledes han naca tu pasu nikatuuday katuud ku malaliday kyu macalaiaw, mahida sa ales hantu nuheni kunipiliwliw amibakuhac. . 1625 a mihcaan , inatukay mala Balduino Enrico nu singing " pangangan han Boudewijn Hendricksz Bowdoin Henrick" nu mukeliday nu hulan a hitay mahimin han nuheni mialaw kuytiniay, nika El Morro mapacuked kuni kasasetulan maalaw maelul kya kitidaan . 1625 Balduino Enrico ( Boudewijn Hendricksz Bowdoin Henrick) El Morro . u hulan a tademaw masawacunu huan.te.amayceketa a siwuy nu hitay 50 a binawlan atu aylmulu a kitidaan nu sipanya a hitay bakuhaca a paculul. 50 . ienal a malepacaw u 60 hulan nu ahitay mamin mapatay. Ibayu'ay nu balunga nu putulike taenal, madwmwc nu heni ku balyngaay a tademaw. 60 . . namakay matenesay a malepacaw, u sipanya a hitay atu tukayay a binawlan atu miedapay musikulay kyu cay kasikeda ku heni, sisa makayni nu micumuday a muwala tu madakepay a bunawlan i subal. . 10 abulad 21 ademiad, ci enlike i hutalaysa a tukay mipalamal amu tuduh tina tukay, ci "Amézqueta Andrés Botello a siwiy a hitay pasatedep amibugay, kyu mukelid tu 200 a tademaw pasada i ada nu nadikudan tu nuayawan a mibaetung mibakuhac. 10 21 . Amézqueta Andrés Botello 200 . 1797 a mihcaan, i huwaku yu kalepacawan henay, ci lalhu.apukelingpi a kakitaan " mahka namuwala tu telinita" mukeliday tu ingku a hitay mikiayaw mibakuhac tu putulike. 1797 . u hitaynida i tukay, u putulike nu sapiading tu cudad patucek tu nita a sapiading idaw ku sapaayaw kyu pacici han tu apalaliwasak. u cacanan a kawaw, pasu sipanya nu paliwalay payawan sananay, 1815 a mihcaan u kakitaan patucek tu hulic tina subalan mibuhat tu sapi isid tu kakitidaan a tu nisawacuan a binawlan, kyu i 18 asiki nudikuda 19 asiki nu ayawan senhuan atu duma putulike tucek sat u muenen tini tumisa ahebal mu cebal. . ,1815 18 19 . 1898 a mihcaan 5 ayabylad 8a demiad maysi a kalepacaw itawya sa, u kaygung nu amilika a balunga, duma pasu titeli a balunga, Indian a balunga, niwyi a balunga anhuteli a balunganu satatalawan a balunga atu mungkemali a balunga, u ci wilin.T. sangpusen kumu tudu'ay, katukuh i sehuwan. 1898 5 8 , , , , T .
